title: (x) MICR-style display text - various {Stephen}
content:
A hand drawn version of what I think are the letterforms:   
 [http://www.btinternet.com/~cachet/micrtext.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415143358/http:/www.btinternet.com/~cachet/micrtext.gif)   
   
Two similar instances:   
 [http://www.intvfunhouse.com/mattel/mattel.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415143358/http:/www.intvfunhouse.com/mattel/mattel.jpg)   
 [http://www.rainsound.net/pix/stereolab\_cobra\_big.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415143358/http:/www.rainsound.net/pix/stereolab_cobra_big.jpg)   
   
I'd be grateful for even the tiniest scrap of information concerning this face!
author: mangros

comments.content: [Here's](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415143358/http:/typographi.ca/000539.php#000539) a post on MICR type at _Typographica_.
